document.full_text: initial takeover offers for fortune brands' golf unit are expected to be submitted today by a range of bidders, including adidas ag, nike inc and private equity firms, sources familiar with the situation said on friday.
document.title: bidders tee up for fortune golf unit: sources
lines_and_colors: initial takeover offers for fortune brands' golf unit are expected to be submitted today by a range of bidders, including adidas ag, nike inc and private equity firms, sources familiar with the situation said on friday.
